numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed a difference in acceptance rates.
2. The acceptance rate for legacy applicants is much higher than the acceptance rate for non-legacy applicants.
3. I wonder how the data was found.
4. I ask what the data is based on.
5. I ask whether extracurricular activities affect the graph.
6. I ask whether grades affect the graph.
7. I ask whether the graph uses only test scores.
8. This topic relates to me and my community.
9. I am a high school student.
10. I will apply to colleges soon.
11. Both my parents attended a top-20 college in the US.
12. I wonder whether this fact will improve my chances of admission.
13. I understand that this fact will not improve my chances of admission.
14. Both my older siblings applied to that college.
15. Both my older siblings did not get admitted to that college.
16. The headline is: Do family ties really secure the knot for education?
